name: renationalize
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If a government renationalizes a business or industry that has been denationalized (= changed from being publicly owned to being privately owned), it takes control of it again: The pressure group wants to get the country's railways renationalized. The new president quickly set about renationalizing key industries. Related words
nationalize
renationalization
More examplesFewer examplesUnion leaders called for the industry to be renationalised. One solution to the chaos would be to re-nationalize the industry.A spokesperson denied that the franchises would be renationalized.
